node.doctext:
Mattbox is a native Mac OS X client for the E2 chatterbox and private messages. It has developed from a basic and unstable chat client to a relatively stable, full-featured client for all of your E2 communication needs.

Download Version 0.9.9.9.9: Mattbox.dmg

Requires Mac OS X 10.2 (Jaguar) or newer.

See the writeup for all the details.
node.title: Mattbox: Mac OS X Chatterbox Client
